title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
description: After discovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, mankind sets off on a quest to find its origins with the help of H.A.L. 9000, the world's most advanced supercomputer.

title: Planet of the Apes
description: An astronaut crew crash-lands on a planet in the distant future where intelligent talking apes are the dominant species, and humans are the oppressed and enslaved.

title: Rosemary's Baby
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: A young couple trying for a baby moves into a fancy apartment surrounded by peculiar neighbors. When the wife becomes mysteriously pregnant, paranoia over the safety of her unborn child begins to control her life.

title: Oliver!
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Score of a Musical Picture (Original or Adaptation)
description: A musical adaptation of Charles Dickens's classic tale of an orphan who runs away from a workhouse and joins a group of boys trained to be pickpockets by an elderly mentor.

title: The Lion in Winter
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
Best Music, Original Score for a Motion Picture (not a Musical)
description: King Henry II's three sons all want to inherit the throne, but he won't commit to a choice. They and his wife variously plot to force his hand.

title: Bullitt
description: An all-guts, no-glory San Francisco cop becomes determined to find the underworld kingpin that killed the witness in his protection.

title: Night of the Living Dead
description: A group of people hide from bloodthirsty zombies in a farmhouse.

title: Once Upon a Time in the West
description: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

title: Funny Girl
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: The life of comedienne Fanny Brice, from her early days in the Jewish slums of New York to her rise to fame and her stormy relationship with gambler Nicky Arnstein.

title: The Odd Couple
description: A neat freak and a slob, two divorced men, decide to share an apartment, but their opposite personalities lead to hilarious conflicts.

title: Romeo and Juliet
description: William Shakespeare's classic play about two young star-crossed lovers whose deaths ultimately reconcile their feuding families.

title: Where Eagles Dare
description: A team of Allied soldiers is sent on a daring mission to rescue a captured American general from a Nazi fortress.

title: The Thomas Crown Affair
description: A debonair, adventurous bank executive believes he has pulled off the perfect multi-million dollar heist, only to match wits with a sexy insurance investigator who will do anything to get her man.

title: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
description: A down-on-his-luck inventor turns a broken-down Grand Prix car into a magical flying vehicle for his children, and then they all go off on a magical adventure to save their grandfather in a far-off land.

title: Yellow Submarine
description: The Beatles agree to accompany Captain Fred in his Yellow Submarine and go to Pepperland to free it from the music-hating Blue Meanies.

title: Barbarella
description: In the 41st century, a highly sexual woman is tasked with finding and stopping the evil Durand-Durand, whose Positronic Ray threatens to bring evil back into the galaxy.

title: if....
description: A surrealist story of a student rebellion at a British boarding school.

title: The Party
description: A clumsy aspiring actor from India is accidentally invited to a lavish Hollywood party and proceeds to wreak havoc.

title: Charly
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: A mentally disabled man undergoes an experimental surgery that gives him genius-level intelligence.

title: Rachel, Rachel
description: A lonely, repressed schoolteacher in a small New England town has a sexual awakening.

title: Hang 'Em High
description: A former lawman who survived a lynching returns to seek revenge on his attackers.

title: The Swimmer
description: A man decides to swim his way home through the pools of his wealthy suburban neighborhood, but his journey takes a surreal and dark turn.

title: The Boston Strangler
description: The true story of the hunt for the serial killer who terrorized Boston in the early 1960s.

title: The Green Berets
description: A cynical reporter is sent to Vietnam to cover the Green Berets, and his experiences change his perspective on the war.

title: Faces
description: A look at the disintegration of a modern marriage.

title: Coogan's Bluff
description: An Arizona deputy sheriff is sent to New York City to extradite a prisoner, but he finds himself at odds with the big-city police.

title: Ice Station Zebra
description: A U.S. submarine races to the North Pole to retrieve a downed satellite, but the crew finds that they are not alone.

title: War and Peace
description: An epic adaptation of Leo Tolstoy's novel about the lives of several aristocratic families in Russia during the Napoleonic Wars.

title: Targets
description: The lives of an aging horror film star and a seemingly normal young man who goes on a shooting spree intersect at a drive-in movie theater.

title: Hour of the Wolf
description: An artist and his wife retreat to a remote island, but the artist is haunted by disturbing visions and memories.

title: Shame
description: A couple of musicians living on a remote island are caught in the middle of a brutal civil war.

title: Finian's Rainbow
description: An Irish immigrant and his daughter steal a leprechaun's pot of gold and move to a small town in the American South.

title: Witchfinder General
description: The story of Matthew Hopkins, a ruthless 17th-century witch hunter who terrorized the English countryside.

title: The Heart Is a Lonely Hunter
description: A deaf-mute man in a small Southern town becomes a confidant to a diverse group of lonely and troubled people.

title: Will Penny
description: An aging cowboy takes a job on a ranch and finds himself in a relationship with a woman and her young son.

title: Star!
description: The life and career of stage and screen star Gertrude Lawrence.

title: The Detective
description: A tough New York City detective investigates a murder and uncovers a web of corruption.

title: Head
description: A surreal, stream-of-consciousness film starring the Monkees in a series of psychedelic vignettes.

title: The Devil Rides Out
description: An expert in the occult must rescue a young man and woman from a satanic cult.

title: Stolen Kisses
description: The continuing story of Antoine Doinel, who is discharged from the army and tries to find his way in civilian life.

title: Danger: Diabolik
description: A master thief and his beautiful girlfriend pull off a series of daring heists in this stylish and psychedelic comic book adaptation.
